name: Anchor Atta Flour
description: Made directly from farm wheat and is processed to form atta. It is hygienically sorted and packed with utmost care. It makes soft and sweet-smelling rotis with an incredible aroma. This atta has Vitamin B, dietary fibre, iron, and magnesium, and prevents weight gain. It is simple and healthy with a strong, mild nutty flavour and a fibrous texture, providing great nourishment to your body.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
